title: Vel coz animation bug,/ ult bug
body:
2. the animation freezes when he aa a target, and when he uses spells there is a chance that he might freeze. when he uses ult while he frozen the ult sound goes off but no damage is done. ( i notice this mainly happens in games with the new champ illoia)
i don't know how to upload images

replies.body: Many people have reported this bug in the past, I'm happy Riot is finally looking into it. I find his ult going off but going straight to cd for no reason. It doesn't happen too often, but sometimes you just ult and the animation goes, sound goes, but no damage and straight to cd.
the animation freezes when he aa that happend to me a  lot it was really funny but annoying at the same time

Hey DonKeith,

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating!
